Hi I am sending the Mortality Review for Inmate Jefrey Epstein # 76318-054 dated 09-09-2019.
We are unable to obtain a copy of the Autopsy Report, Discharge Summary Report, Toxicology Report are Death Certificate at this time. We Have been trying to obtain these reports since August 05, 2019. No one has returned our institution calls or responded to our certified mail request for these reports. We are continuing to work on obtaining all required reports.
Very Respectfully,
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
Health Services Administrator
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
